solution_line_template: In the first {num_days_initial} days, he got {num_days_initial}*{visitors_per_day}=<<{num_days_initial}*{visitors_per_day}={initial_visits}>>{initial_visits} visits
So on the 7th day, he got {initial_visits}*{multiplier_last_day}=<<{initial_visits}*{multiplier_last_day}={last_day_visits}>>{last_day_visits} visitors
So he got a total of {last_day_visits}+{initial_visits}=<<{last_day_visits}+{initial_visits}={total_visits}>>{total_visits} visitors
